instruction: Summarize the Wikipedia page about Donald Trump
output: Donald J. Trump is an American businessman, television personality, and politician. He served as the 45th President of the United States from 2017 until 2021. He was also a real estate mogul and founded the Trump Organization. He was the Republican nominee for President of the United States from 2015 until 2017 and then later, during the 2016 election, he was elected the 45th president of the United States. Throughout his presidency, Trump has been credited with implementing tax reforms and economic growth. Additionally, he achieved the brokering of a peace agreement between Israel and the United Arab Emirates.
